pageProduct.name: Thompson's One-A-Day Hawthorn 2000mg 60 Capsules
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Thompson's One-A-Day Hawthorn is a traditional herbal formula to support cardiovascular function. Hawthorn is an antioxidant used in Western herbal medicine as a heart tonic.

Size: 60 capsules

Oil-Free?: Yes

KEY FEATURES

• Traditionally used in Western herbal medicine to support healthy blood circulation.
• Helps reduce free radical damage to body cells.
• Maintain general health and wellbeing.
• Support healthy blood circulation to legs, hands and feet
• Vegetarian/Vegan friendly.

Warnings

If symptoms persist consult your healthcare professional.

CAUTION

Do not use if bottle and/or cap seal is missing or broken. Keep out of reach of children.

Ingredients

Active Ingredients: Each capsule contains:
Crataegus monogyna (Hawthorn) ext. 421mg
derived from dry flower & leaf 2g (2000mg)
std. to contain Vitexin-2-rhamnoside 12.6mg

Directions

Store below 30°C in a dry place.

Storage Temperature: Below 30°C

RECYCLABLE INFORMATION

Remove cap and recycle glass

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
